description:
Kevin and his lover, Maria, are running away from the mafia. Maria reminds Satake of Chie, so when the two lovers are in danger, Satake rushes to help them, but instead he gets caught. Three of them are locked away in an inescapable shack. With no food or water, they get weaker as the time passes, but it was only the beginning of the tragedy. Most gruesome execution by the mafia is about to start...
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai o Kurai Au Kemono-tachi: Saikyou Shokei Drug de Jinkaku Houkai
Beasts That Feeds on Love: Atrocious Punishment: Personalities Destroyed by Drugs
愛を喰らい合う獣たち 最凶処刑ドラッグで人格崩壊
